text: Annette Crosbie (born 12 February 1934) is a Scottish actress.Annette Crosbie filmography at the Bfi database accessed 7 January 2016. She is known for her role as Margaret Meldrew in the BBC sitcom One Foot in the Grave (1990â€“2000). She won the BAFTA Award twice for The Six Wives of Henry VIII in 1971 and Edward the Seventh in 1976. Her other movie appearances include The Pope Must Die (1991), Shooting Fish (1997), Calendar Girls (2003) and Into the Woods (2014). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:People from Midlothian
title: Annette Crosbie
